name: STAR STRUGGLE
description:
Game made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 49

You find yourself stranded in unknown territory with a malfunctioning ship!
Beat hordes of alien ships while you try to survive in a VERY unstable spaceship.

You're in control of a physics-based ship with a physics-based weapon in an otherwise traditional shoot 'em up, making what should be a simple task very complicated!
You can lock your weapon to stop it from moving, but doing so will cause the ship to heat up (as well as shooting), and if the ship heats up too much, it will explode!
So if you want to survive, you better learn how to handle the ship to the best of your abilities.
--------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:
Arrow keys - Move
Z - Shoot
X - Lock cannon in place
Esc - Pause
Alt+Enter - Fullscreen

Also has gamepad support (shoot with face buttons, lock with triggers, pause with start. Only D-Pad for movement).
